name: glintz-monorepo
description: Glintz - Mobile-first travel discovery app with swipe-based hotel browsing

scripts.install:all: cd api && npm install && cd ../app && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd api && npm run dev" "cd app && npm start"
scripts.clean: cd api && rm -rf node_modules dist && cd ../app && rm -rf node_modules .expo
scripts.clean:ios: cd app && expo r -c && rm -rf ios/build

author: Glintz Team
